alert.note: Alert for Caruthers - San Joaquin - Selma (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued January 29 at 10:54AM PST until February 02 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE MONDAY NIGHT THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 11 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 27 possible. * WHERE...Caruthers San -Joaquin Selma. - * WHEN...For the Dense Fog Advisory, until 11 AM PST this morning. For the Freeze Watch, from late Monday night through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
